system.description:
This spell creates an invisible, immovable barrier or object of pure magical force. The field is impervious to all attacks and spells, except for disintegrate or a wish. A dispel magic spell cannot remove it.

Shape & Size:

  • Can be a sphere (up to **20' radius**), hemisphere, flat surface, cylinder, or a box (up to 5,000 square feet in total area).
  • Must have smooth, regular surfaces.
  • The edges are blunt and cause no damage.
  • Cannot form inside a creature or solid object; instead, gaps will appear.

Barrier Properties:

  • The force field cannot be moved, except by a wish.
  • Nothing can pass throughâ€”spells, attacks, and breath weapons all bounce off.
  • Bypassing Methods: Teleport, dimension door, or planar travel (such as gate) can bypass the barrier.
  • A sealed force field prevents starvation and suffocation. It magically preserves enclosed creatures from natural death.

Uses:

  • Can be used as an impassable wall, prison, floor, stairway, or object.
  • Can be made permanent with permanence, but remains dispellable.
  • A permanent force field vanishes if destroyed by disintegrate or wished away.

Duration:

The force field lasts for 6 turns (60 rounds).
